subject: Automated Reply Re: "[Radiance-general] questions from newbie"
body:
This is an automated reply to your message "[Radiance-general] questions from newbie" sent to chris@zed-uk.com.

Dear "Chien Si Harriman" <CHarriman@gb-eng.com>

Thank you for your email. I am away from the office till Friday 22nd May.  I will be receiving my emails, but may not be able to reply to them promptly. If you have an urgent query please contact my colleague Eric Roberts on 0161 3386200 or via email to eric@zed-uk.com.

Thanks

Chris
replyTo: Subject: Automated Reply Re: "[Radiance-general] questions from newbie"
